# üñºÔ∏è Image Captioning with Hugging Face Transformers

This project demonstrates how to generate captions for images using a pretrained model from Hugging Face ü§ó ‚Äî specifically, `nlpconnect/vit-gpt2-image-captioning`.

---

## üß† Model Used

- **Model**: [`nlpconnect/vit-gpt2-image-captioning`](https://huggingface.co/nlpconnect/vit-gpt2-image-captioning)
- **Backbone**: Vision Transformer (ViT) + GPT-2

---

## üì∑ Example Image & Caption

| Image | Generated Caption |
|-------|-------------------|
| ![Parrots](data:image/jpeg;base64,) | "two parrots are sitting on a branch" |
| ![Bike](images/bike.jpg) | "a man riding a motorcycle on the street" |

---

## üì¶ Installation

Install required Python libraries:

```bash
pip install transformers torch torchvision pillow matplotlib
